bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Sample Barcode Metrics

Sample Barcode Metrics

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

# S4 method for seurat
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

Interesting group, to use for colors.

Value

data.frame with cellular barcodes as rows.

See also

sampleMetadata().

Other Quality Control Metrics: plotCellCounts, plotGenesPerCell, plotMitoRatio, plotMitoVsCoding, plotNovelty, plotReadsPerCell, plotUMIsPerCell, plotUMIsVsGenes, plotZerosVsDepth

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seurat.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
metrics(bcb) %>% glimpse()
#> Loading required package: bcbioSingleCell
#> Error in (function (classes, fdef, mtable) {    methods <- .findInheritedMethods(classes, fdef, mtable)    if (length(methods) == 1L)         return(methods[[1L]])    else if (length(methods) == 0L) {        cnames <- paste0("\"", vapply(classes, as.character,             ""), "\"", collapse = ", ")        stop(gettextf("unable to find an inherited method for function %s for signature %s",             sQuote(fdef@generic), sQuote(cnames)), domain = NA)    }    else stop("Internal error in finding inherited methods; didn't return a unique method",         domain = NA)})(list(structure("bcbioSingleCell", package = "bcbioSingleCell")),     structure(function (object, ...)     {        standardGeneric("metrics")    }, generic = structure("metrics", package = "bcbioBase"), package = "bcbioBase", group = list(), valueClass = character(0), signature = "object", default = `\001NULL\001`, skeleton = (function (object,         ...)     stop("invalid call in method dispatch to 'metrics' (no default method)",         domain = NA))(object, ...), class = structure("nonstandardGenericFunction", package = "methods")),     <environment>): unable to find an inherited method for function 'metrics' for signature '"bcbioSingleCell"'

# seurat
metrics(seurat) %>% glimpse()
